author: Lorin
title: Inside the Air Force - January 10, 2025
text: Submitted by lorin on Thu, 01/09/2025 - 15:14 Former Trump official: Regulation, acquisition process stymieing space innovationF-15 EPAWSS cleared for full-rate productionFY-25 NDAA directs Air Force, Navy to reassess air-to-air missile inventory requirementsSDA to host industry day for second set of experimentation satellitesF-15EX, F-35A to replace some Air National Guard F-15C/D squadronsB61-12 Life Extension Program completeArmy tapping BAE to build prototype airbase defense hypervelocity projectile cannonDOD releases FY-25 investment strategy for strategic capital officeFY-25 NDAA includes various cyber programsAustin moves final tranche of Ukraine aid amid political uncertainty and Trump's arrivalWicker named Senate Armed Services Committee chairmanOperator-led procurements are needed to keep up with adversaries, assistant defense secretary saysMercury Systems announces board changesBoeing appoints Deasy as new CIOProteus Enterprises buys Ricardo DefenseGAO: L3Harris bid for HADES award lacked necessary technical detailAnduril acquires air and missile defense contractor's radar, C2 businessesNewsletter Type: Inside the Air Force
